charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Ball Guy
chatting with Ethan.
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_030: Ethan was just showing me his Poké Balls!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_040:
Apparently, Ball Guy’s been asking to see
what Poké Balls folks on Pasio have.
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_050:
You can tell a lot about a person by the
balls they use!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_070: Thanks! Let’s see what you’ve got...
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_080: I can’t ball-lieve my eyes! Look at this!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_0401_100: I found a very precious ball!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_0302_110: I think I’ve seen that kind before!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_0402_120:
I’d expect no less from you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_130:
This ball was crafted by Kurt, a Poké Ball
smith in Johto.
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_140:
Poké Balls like this are handcrafted out of
Apricorns!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_160:
The number of folks who can handcraft balls
is dwindling.
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_170:
It’s true that balls can be mass-produced
now, but that’s just not the same.
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_190:
In the past, Poké Balls were made from
Apricorns and other natural materials.
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_200:
So they had a unique, rustic feel—just like
my Hisuian Electrode!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_210:
Poké Balls are just full of surprises, don’t
you think?
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_220:
I guess I hadn’t thought about it much until
now, but it makes sense that Poké Balls have
their own history.
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_230:
There might be even more Poké Balls out
there that I’ve never seen!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_240: Are you interested in learning more?
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_250: If so, I can show you my collection!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_260:
Really?! C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
you should come check it out, too!
charaepi_ch0282_10_ballguy/2301_1201_270: If there’s a ball you like, it’s all yours!
